statements: SELECT * FROM QuantumErrorCorrection
SELECT code_name, code_description FROM QuantumErrorCorrection
SELECT code_id, code_name, syndrome_type FROM QuantumErrorCorrection
SELECT * FROM QuantumErrorCorrection WHERE code_id = 1
SELECT code_name, syndrome_report FROM QuantumErrorCorrection
SELECT code_name, code_description, syndrome_type FROM QuantumErrorCorrection WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM QuantumErrorCorrection WHERE code_id > 5;
SELECT code_id, code_name, syndrome_report FROM QuantumErrorCorrection WHERE syndrome_type = 'XYZ';
SELECT code_name, code_description FROM QuantumErrorCorrection WHERE code_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY code_id DESC;
SELECT CONCAT(code_name, ' - ', syndrome_type) AS Name_Type, UPPER(code_description) AS Description FROM QuantumErrorCorrection WHERE LENGTH(code_name) > 5 ORDER BY code_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM error_correction_codes;
SELECT code_id, code_name FROM error_correction_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT code_name, code_description FROM error_correction_codes WHERE code_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM syndromes ORDER BY syndrome_code_id DESC;
SELECT syndrome_id, syndrome_code_id, syndrome_description FROM syndromes WHERE syndrome_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM error_correction_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT code_name, code_description FROM error_correction_codes WHERE code_name LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM error_correction_codes ORDER BY code_name DESC;
SELECT ecc.code_name, syn.syndrome_description FROM error_correction_codes ecc INNER JOIN syndromes syn ON ecc.code_id = syn.syndrome_code_id;
SELECT code_id, code_name, code_description FROM error_correction_codes WHERE code_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM error_correction_codes;
SELECT code_id, code_name FROM error_correction_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM syndromes;
SELECT syndrome_name FROM syndromes WHERE syndrome_id = 2;

SELECT code_name, syndrome_name FROM error_correction_codes JOIN codes_syndromes ON error_correction_codes.code_id = codes_syndromes.code_id JOIN syndromes ON codes_syndromes.syndrome_id = syndromes.syndrome_id;
SELECT * FROM codes_syndromes JOIN error_correction_codes ON codes_syndromes.code_id = error_correction_codes.code_id JOIN syndromes ON codes_syndromes.syndrome_id = syndromes.syndrome_id;
SELECT code_name, properties FROM error_correction_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT syndrome_name, properties FROM syndromes WHERE syndrome_id = 2;
SELECT code_id, syndrome_id FROM codes_syndromes WHERE code_id = 3;

SELECT error_correction_codes.code_name, syndromes.syndrome_name, codes_syndromes.code_id, codes_syndromes.syndrome_id FROM codes_syndromes JOIN error_correction_codes ON codes_syndromes.code_id = error_correction_codes.code_id JOIN syndromes ON codes_syndromes.syndrome_id = syndromes.syndrome_id;
SELECT * FROM Quantum_Error_Correction_Codes;
SELECT code_name, code_description FROM Quantum_Error_Correction_Codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT syndrome_name, syndrome_code_id FROM Code_Syndromes ORDER BY syndrome_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Syndrome_Errors WHERE error_syndrome_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM Error_Logs WHERE log_error_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quantum_Error_Correction_Codes;
SELECT code_name, code_description FROM Quantum_Error_Correction_Codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Code_Syndromes ORDER BY syndrome_name DESC;
SELECT error_description FROM Syndrome_Errors WHERE error_syndrome_id = 3;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM Error_Logs WHERE log_error_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM QuantumErrorCorrectionCodes;
SELECT code_name, code_description FROM QuantumErrorCorrectionCodes;
SELECT syndrome_name, syndrome_description FROM QuantumSyndromes;
SELECT * FROM CodeSyndromeMapping ORDER BY mapping_id DESC;
SELECT code_id, COUNT(*) AS total_syndromes FROM CodeSyndromeMapping GROUP BY code_id;
SELECT * FROM QuantumErrorCorrectionCodes;
SELECT code_id, code_name FROM QuantumErrorCorrectionCodes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT code_name AS Name, code_description AS Description FROM QuantumErrorCorrectionCodes;
SELECT * FROM QuantumSyndromes ORDER BY syndrome_name ASC;
SELECT stats_date, stats_value FROM CodeStatistics WHERE code_id = 2 ORDER BY stats_date DESC;
